Description: Happy Holidays! Up for sale is my all original 2014 Gibson Les Paul Traditional 120th Anniversary Guitar in gorgeous Manhattan Midnight Blue Finish. The guitar is in excellent condition with low action setup ready to play out of the box. Original case in excellent condition as well. No modifications and all stock. Case Candy: Gibson Warranty Card, Gibson Cleaning Cloth, Truss Rod Wrench and Gibson booklet. Issues to mention: 1. Surface scratches throughout expected from moderate use over 4+ years. 2. Small nick and indent on top of head (see picture).3. Binding fade at 10th fret (see picture). 4. Setup with lowest action possible for my playing style. New owner may need to change for individual taste.5. Grover locking strap buttons installed but original Gibson buttons will be put back on before boxing and shipping. Specifications per the Gibson: - Item # LPTD14MMCH1 (Manhattan Midnight). Search the item number to get more details.- Body: Mahogany / No weight relief - Top: AA figured maple- Neck: Mahogany, Late 50's thickness (.900 1st Fret = 1.000 12th Fret)- Fingerboard: Bound Rosewood, Trapezoid Inlays with 120th Anniversary inlay - Frets: Cryogenically Tempered, 22- Radius: 12"- Nut/E.O.B: 1.695/2.260- Nut Material: TekToid- Bridge: Chrome Tune-o-Matic- Tuners: TonePros Vintage-Style with Perloid Buttons- Plating: Chrome- Tuning Ratio: 16:1- Electronics: '59 Tribute Humbucker with orange drop capacitors - Potentiometers: 2 Volume Controls,- 2 Tone Controls- Toggle Switch: Three-way Switchcraft with Cream Plastic Tip- Plastics: Cream, Gold Speed Knobs w/dial pointers Check out this YouTube Video review and demo from Greg at Wildwood Guitars: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0FFXvu7Sko I absolutely cherish this guitar and is a very difficult decision to let it go. The Tribute 59 Humbuckers were only offered on some models in 2014 and 2015. They produce some of the best Gibson PAF Tones available. My hope is to find a good home where it can inspire another player. I have provided high resolution pictures with natural outdoor lighting for your review. Feel free to contact me with any questions or requests for additional pictures/information. This will be auction style starting price of $999.00 with an Initial Buy It Now option and will let the market demand dictate the final selling price. Seller has the right to end the auction at any time. Note on US and International Shipping: If auction goes to buyer outside the continental US then final shipping charges will be calculated based on weight of 25 lbs and dimensions of 48" x 20" x 10". We can discuss shipping options as well so please ask before the end of the auction. If this is a Christmas gift and you need by Dec 24th then please contact for expedited shipping options and I will make sure it is packed and ready to ship immediately following payment.
Title: Gibson 2014 Les Paul Traditional 120th Anniversary Manhattan Midnight
ConditionDescription: The guitar and case are in excellent condition with normal wear expected from moderate use such as surface scratches, one very small nick and indents on top of head and yellowing on binding at 10 fret.  See pictures for details.
